channel.title: CVE Feed for WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43232|2024-08-19T17:02:06.510Z -- wp%20onlinesupport%2C%20essential%20plugin -- timeline%20and%20history%20slider
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin Timeline and History slider allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Timeline and History slider: from n/a through 2.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-32601|2024-08-02T02:13:40.352Z -- wp%20onlinesupport%2C%20essential%20plugin -- popup%20anything
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin Popup Anything.This issue affects Popup Anything: from n/a through 2.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-32601|2024-06-04T17:50:25.125Z -- wp%20onlinesupport%2C%20essential%20plugin -- popup%20anything
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin Popup Anything.This issue affects Popup Anything: from n/a through 2.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-48273|2024-06-11T18:25:31.503Z -- wp%20onlinesupport%2C%20essential%20plugin -- preloader%20for%20website
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin Preloader for Website.This issue affects Preloader for Website: from n/a through 1.2.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-48273|2024-08-02T21:23:39.456Z -- wp%20onlinesupport%2C%20essential%20plugin -- preloader%20for%20website
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin Preloader for Website.This issue affects Preloader for Website: from n/a through 1.2.2.
